summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Greek office attendance calendar app after fixing CORS configuration. Both backend and frontend are now fully functional with 100% authentication success and all core features working.

ui_bugs.issue: Minor issue with textarea.clear() method in Playwright - does not affect user functionality
ui_bugs.workaround: Use fill('') instead of clear() in automation scripts

Calendar day click opens attendance dialog
Attendance dialog closes after successful save
Logout functionality redirects to login page
